sec.code: import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import pandas as pd import numpy as np

plt.figure(figsize = [10,5]) sns.violinplot(data = Bdf, x = "CpG_position", y = 'methylierung', hue = 'Gruppe', split = True) plt.title('BDNF CpG methylation by Group') plt.xlabel('CpG-Position') plt.ylabel('Methylation-Values') plt.savefig('BDNF_CpG_methylation_by_group.png', dpi = 300)

plt.figure(figsize = [25,5]) sns.violinplot(data = Tdf, x = "CpG_position", y = "methylation", hue = "Gruppe", split = True) plt.title('Tau CpG methylation by Group') plt.xlabel('CpG-Position') plt.ylabel('Tau-Methylation-Values') plt.savefig('Tau_CpG_methylation_by_group.png', dpi = 300)

plt.figure(figsize = [24,5]) sns.violinplot(data = Pdf, x = "CpG_Position", y = "methylation", hue = "Gruppe", split = True) plt.title('Tau CpG methylation by Group') plt.xlabel('CpG-Position') plt.ylabel('PSD95-Methylation-Values') plt.savefig('PSD95_CpG_methylation_by_group.png', dpi = 300)
